creator: imetrex@gmail.com
text:
Setting the "httpclient.localaddress" property in the jmeter.properties file has no effect.

Setting this using the -j switch does not work as well.

I am using JMeter 2.7 r1342410

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.

In future please ask on the user list.

In this case, note that the property only works with HTTPClient samplers
